products.title: Splash Vine Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Vine Green Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash vine green roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade.
Roller blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2050 Fabric Colour: Vine Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Pear Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Pear Green Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Pear Green is a lush green roller blind that will add a sleek finish to your interior styling.This light-filtering, dim-out roller blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. We think this shade looks beautiful when paired with rich wooden tones within the home or as a statement shade with nuetrals.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2071 Fabric Colour: Pear Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Moss Green Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Moss Green Roller Blind in Green. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Moss Green is a beautiful colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder great for injecting colour into any room. Our Splash Moss Green roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.
Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2098 Fabric Colour: Moss Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Mirage
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Mirage Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
